hero.title: Structured decision support and documentation rehearsal for primary care.
hero.description: Clinical Copilot guides clinicians through scripted encounters, surfacing likely differentials, suggested workups, and documentation cues from a curated library while keeping every step deterministic and reviewable.

disclaimer.text: Demo onlyâ€”do not use this prototype for patient care, diagnosis, or treatment decisions. Data remains local and all outputs are simulated.
